creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panel huipil, open on sides; weft patterning in broad bands on upper half; stylized peacocks and floral forms on lower two bands, upper band primarily stylized tree form; red ground with purple, green and yellow patterns.
medium: Silk, cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
